feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens, commas, and informal punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit informal word choice and show some similarity in the use of language.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have similar sentence structures and quantitative features in terms of coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Both texts have a similar tone with informal expressions and sarcasm evident in the writing.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
